price: 16. Di atas mereka ada lapisan-lapisan dari api dan di bawahnya juga ada lapisan-lapisan yang disediakan bagi mereka. Demikianlah Allah mengancam hamba-hamba-Nya (dengan azab itu). “Wahai hamba-hamba-Ku, maka bertakwalah kepada-Ku.”
arabic: لَهُم مِّن فَوۡقِهِمۡ ظُلَلٞ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمِن تَحۡتِهِمۡ ظُلَلٞۚ ذَٰلِكَ يُخَوِّفُ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦ عِبَادَهُۥۚ يَٰعِبَادِ فَٱتَّقُونِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lahum min fawqihim ẓulalun mina al-nāri wamin taḥtihim ẓulalun dhālika yukhawwifu al-lahu bihi ʿibādahu yāʿibādi fa-ittaqūni
